definition: morning dew/fig. precarious brevity of human life/ephemeral
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
human life as the morning dew (idiom); fig. ephemeral and precarious nature of human existence
human life as the morning dew (idiom); fig. ephemeral and precarious nature of human existence
precarious as the morning dew (idiom); fig. ephemeral and precarious nature of human existence
precarious as morning dew (idiom); unlikely to last out the day
the morning dew will swiftly dissipate (idiom); fig. ephemeral and precarious nature of human existence
floating clouds, morning dew (idiom); fig. ephemeral nature of human existence
the morning dew will swiftly dissipate (idiom); fig. ephemeral and precarious nature of human existence
body will go with the morning dew (idiom); fig. ephemeral and precarious nature of human existence
flash of lightning, morning dew (idiom); fig. ephemeral/impermanent

sentences.english: And the brink of the dewy caves.
Let us share morning dew and cold wave together , share rosy clouds and fog mists .
sentences.chinese: 让我们一起分担朝露和寒潮，共享云霞和雾霭。

sentences.english: Once, there is a desire to be able to follow the sun follow the dew.
sentences.chinese: 曾经，有个愿望，能跟着朝露去追随太阳。

sentences.english: I chose one that was still wet from the morning dew with traces of dirt and sand on its skin.
sentences.chinese: 我挑了一个，上面还带有朝露的湿气并沾着点沙土。

sentences.english: Is Dew In The Morning A Good Way To Predict The Weather?
Life is poetically compared to the morning dew.
sentences.chinese: 人生被富有诗意地比喻为朝露。

sentences.english: Under the dew, the beautiful flowers shaking their figures.
sentences.chinese: 朝露下，鲜花摇摆的美丽身姿。

sentences.english: Transparent bright effect is like rose flowers with morning dews.
sentences.chinese: 透薄的亮泽效果，就像洒满朝露的玫瑰花瓣。

sentences.english: The dew that used to wet thee.
sentences.chinese: 朝露曾经打湿你的衣裳。

definition: bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
autumn frost/fig. white hair as sign of old age
